event: Richard A. Hosley II becomes CEO and President of BMC Software.
First day of trading for BMC stock.
BMC is re-incorporated in Delaware and goes public with an initial public offering.
BMC announces its acquisition by a group of major private equity investment groups.
The acquisition process is completed and BMC is no longer publicly traded.
Peter Leav becomes president and CEO of BMC Software.
BMC is acquired by KKR from a private investor group led by Bain Capital Private Equity and Golden Gate Capital.
BMC launches SaaS-based BMC Helix Control-M application workflow orchestration.
Ayman Sayed is named as President and CEO of BMC Software.
BMC announces the launch of the TrueSight suite utilizing AI and machine learning.
